component.name: Hetairos AI
component.summary: Your AI Waifu Assistant with Voice and Animated Interactions

description.p: Hetairos AI is a unique AI waifu assistant that combines powerful local AI models with charming animated character interactions. Unlike typical AI assistants, Hetairos brings your desktop to life with an animated companion that responds to your voice and provides intelligent assistance.
Features include real-time voice interaction, expressive animations, and complete privacy through local AI model execution - no cloud services required.
